title: Leadership
description: As a frontend lead, I motivate others to achieve technical goals. I also design traing programs and tutor new hires.

title: Aesthetic
description: With long-term study in Fine Arts and knowledge in UI UX, I am able to bring visual creation and frontend together

title: Teamwork
description: I maintain good communication and collaboration within and outside of my team.

title: Cross-Cultural
description: With co-workers in Spain and customers all over the world. I am open-minded and respect different cultures.

title: Agile
description: I bring the culture of progressive development and strong business mindset to boost team performance.
